name: Dice Hitman
description:
Dice Hitman is a game where you are the hitman. Dice Hitman rolls 3 dice to determine who he needs to kill. Every dice shows a different part of appearance: Hair, Eyes and Mouth.

How to play:

 - Search for your target.

 - Right click to aim.

 - Left click to shoot.

Credits:

 - Game and Art made by JokubasG

 - Music from bensound.org by Benjamin Tissot
